TopicTitle: KSP Crashes on fourth stage of specific rocket - things are starting to get really weird

Articles.Content:
**KSP:** Mac 0.90 32bit

**Problem Story:** I'm building a statin in Munar orbit. I have the first module there and am trying to launch my favorite lander/interplanetary shuttle (I call her the Phoenix) plus a docking hub to connect to the Station. Here's where it gets really, really weird: When I try to stage the fourth stage, the game never fails to crash. It doesn't happen for any other rocket; just this one.

**Mods Installed:**

    000_ToolbarActiveTextureManagementAerojetKerbodyneAnimatedDecouplersBahaSPCrossFeedEnablerFirespitterHabitatPackJSIKAXKerbaltekMechJeb2MechJeb2 Embedded by Dennis6492Modulefixer.dllModuleManager.2.5.13.dllModuleManager.ConfigCacheModuleManager.ConfigSHANearFutureConstructionNearFutureElectricalNearFuturePropsNearFuturePropulsionNearFutureSolarNearFutureSpacecraftProceduralDynamicsPteronR&SCapsuledyneREADME.mdRealChuteSDHISmokeScreenSpaceY-LiftersToadicusToolstoolbar-settings.datTundraExplorationTweakableEverythingTweakScaleVirgin Kalactic

**Reproduction steps:**

Copy [my rocket](http://imgur.com/Y9A3zZ1), launch it and try to stage the fourth stage. For me, at least, it will crash the game no matter how hard I cross my fingers.

[**Player.log**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/zgv0mh9ml96yb86/Player.log?dl=0)
